item.title: Need help with wild
item.dc:creator: @I_SiS_I I SiS I
item.description:
@I_SiS_I wrote:

[quote=“LKCTheReturn, post:1, topic:137580”]ok when i go into my client.java… and i edit the wild it will not change to what i made the wild coords… it just stays the same. how do i fix it??? these are the coords that i’m trying to change them into.

public boolean IsInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if (Type == 1) { if (coordY >= 3520 && coordY <= 3493 && coordX <= 3415 && coordX >= 3453) { //return true; } } else if (Type == 2) { if (coordY >= 3520 && coordY <= 3493 && coordX <= 3415 && coordX >= 3453) { //return true; } } return false; }[/quote]

at the bottom where return false; make it true

item.title: Need help with wild

item.description:
@LKCTheReturn wrote:

ok when i go into my client.java… and i edit the wild it will not change to what i made the wild coords… it just stays the same. how do i fix it??? these are the coords that i’m trying to change them into.

public boolean IsInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if (Type == 1) { if (coordY >= 3520 && coordY <= 3493 && coordX <= 3415 && coordX >= 3453) { //return true; } } else if (Type == 2) { if (coordY >= 3520 && coordY <= 3493 && coordX <= 3415 && coordX >= 3453) { //return true; } } return false; }
